posts.post_title: FS: Large T206 HOF & SL Lot - Priced Individually  **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 Hall of Famers, Southern Leaguers and higher dollar commons. Condition should be accurately reflected by the scans. Payment via any method you prefer. All prices are delivered. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve any cards. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier reading):

Chance (yellow portrait) - PSA 2(mk) Fac 42 overprint - $50
J. Collins - $35
Crawford (batting) - $50
Griffith (portrait) - SGC 10 Fac 649 overprint - $28
Huggins (hands at mouth) - $60
F. King (Piedmont, raw) - $28
F. King (Old Mill) - SGC 10 - $28
Lentz - $25
M. Miller - $10
Rockenfeld - $28
F. White - $50
Willis (throwing) - Polar Bear SGC 40, ghost image on front - $105
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks!
Bump for a final price drop.  Some good deals to be had!

Friendly bump.

Some very good deals - but it doesn't quite fit my collection.  Someone ought to be happy though :)

Best,
S
